commentary: Morkel to Ponting, no run another appeal! Again Morkel sprays this a little too far down the leg side, but it touches something on the way through. The South Africans think its glove/bat, but the umpire insists it was only pad. And he's right, by the looks of things

commentary: Morkel to Ponting, 1 run a well played shot for just one run, Ponting stepping confidently forward and driving wide of mid off. Amla sprinted to his left and tumbled into a sliding stop to keep him to just one

commentary: Morkel to Clarke, FOUR runs imperious! The bounce in this track is very consistent, and so the batsmen have the confidence to play shots like these. Morkel offered width outside off, but the length was tricky - middling. Clarke made the most of it, however, hammering the ball square of the wicket with his weight forward
text: imperious! The bounce in this track is very consistent, and so the batsmen have the confidence to play shots like these. Morkel offered width outside off, but the length was tricky - middling. Clarke made the most of it, however, hammering the ball square of the wicket with his weight forward

commentary: Steyn to Ponting, FOUR runs edged to third man! There is a slip in place but this was far too wide for him. Ponting was aiming for a backfoot punch to cover, but Steyn shaped one away from him to take a healthy edge. Unfortunately for him, it flew at a catchable height through the vacant second/third slip area
text: edged to third man! There is a slip in place but this was far too wide for him. Ponting was aiming for a backfoot punch to cover, but Steyn shaped one away from him to take a healthy edge. Unfortunately for him, it flew at a catchable height through the vacant second/third slip area

commentary: Doherty to Boucher, OUT there's an appeal from Doherty as Boucher misses a flick to leg and is hit on the pads, but it's quickly quashed. How close was this? Doherty doesn't look that confident, but Clarke wants to review it. Yep, it pitched in line and would've taken out middle and leg, Boucher is out!

commentary: Doherty to Botha, no run he sweeps right over the top of one! Botha bent down and tried to smash, but couldn't get anything on it

commentary: Doherty to Botha, no run beaten slashing outside off now! Botha thought the cut was on. It wasn't
text: beaten slashing outside off now! Botha thought the cut was on. It wasn't

commentary: Doherty to Botha, no run cracking delivery! Doherty is really putting pressure on Botha. This one was slower through the air, gripped on the greasy surface, and spun past the outside edge of his poking bat

commentary: Doherty to Botha, 2 runs flicked off the toes to midwicket, and they hurry back for the second
text: flicked off the toes to midwicket, and they hurry back for the second

commentary: Marsh to du Plessis, 1 run a late cut bounces down to third man
text: a late cut bounces down to third man

commentary: Marsh to Botha, no run another appeal! Marsh nips one in off the seam, as he has done quite a bit on this tour already, and zipped between bat and pad. The Australians thought he got something on it, but it probably touched the back leg. There's no review

commentary: Marsh to Botha, no run beaten outside off, on the cut! Botha is taking a while to settle out there
text: beaten outside off, on the cut! Botha is taking a while to settle out there

commentary: Marsh to Botha, no run full and straight, Botha coming forward with bat and pad together in defence
text: full and straight, Botha coming forward with bat and pad together in defence

commentary: Marsh to Botha, no run dropped by Cummins at mid on! It was such an easy chance too. Botha was rushed into a pull and the ball popped tamely to mid on. He got there in good time but it hit the palm and popped straight out
text: dropped by Cummins at mid on! It was such an easy chance too. Botha was rushed into a pull and the ball popped tamely to mid on. He got there in good time but it hit the palm and popped straight out

commentary: Marsh to Botha, 1 run tapped to cover point, on the up, for a quick single
text: tapped to cover point, on the up, for a quick single

commentary: Doherty to Botha, no run Botha uses his feet well to get right to the pitch and smash a drive, but unfortunately for him he hits it straight at the fielder
text: Botha uses his feet well to get right to the pitch and smash a drive, but unfortunately for him he hits it straight at the fielder

commentary: Doherty to Botha, 1 run and now he's just about swung himself off his feet attempting a mow to leg. He recovers in time to take the single
text: and now he's just about swung himself off his feet attempting a mow to leg. He recovers in time to take the single

commentary: Doherty to du Plessis, 1 run Faf skips down and collects a single to long on
text: Faf skips down and collects a single to long on

commentary: Doherty to Botha, 1 run Botha is living dangerously! He charges the bowler and tries to go over long on, but can't get a good connection. In fact, he hits it so badly that it falls in front of the fielder, saving him

commentary: Doherty to du Plessis, FOUR runs a misfield by Smith at deep cover allows four! The ball was driven very hard out into that region, but he just over-ran it
shortText: Doherty to du Plessis, FOUR runs

commentary: Doherty to du Plessis, 1 run driven down to long off for one

commentary: Johnson to du Plessis, 1 wide and he starts with a horrid wide miles outside off
text: and he starts with a horrid wide miles outside off

commentary: Johnson to du Plessis, OUT Faf goes on the attack, but he slices across the attempted loft and the ball loops out to Mike Hussey at deep cover. South Africa sink further. They need to reach 172 by the 20th over to be par on D/L now

commentary: Johnson to Botha, 1 run flapped across the line towards mid on, where the fielder slips on the outfield and allows a single
text: flapped across the line towards mid on, where the fielder slips on the outfield and allows a single

commentary: Johnson to Steyn, no run the bouncer rises up past the grille of the batsman, who sways out of the way
text: the bouncer rises up past the grille of the batsman, who sways out of the way

commentary: Johnson to Steyn, no run Steyn rides the bounce of another short delivery to defend to point
text: Steyn rides the bounce of another short delivery to defend to point

commentary: Johnson to Steyn, 1 run chopped down to third man for one

commentary: Johnson to Botha, FOUR runs hammered down the ground! Botha takes South Africa to 99 with a drilled straight drive
text: hammered down the ground! Botha takes South Africa to 99 with a drilled straight drive

commentary: Bollinger to Steyn, no run he slams one down short of a good length to start, Steyn tapping to gully
text: he slams one down short of a good length to start, Steyn tapping to gully

commentary: Bollinger to Steyn, 1 leg bye there's a speculative appeal from Bollinger as Steyn is struck on the pad, but this landed well outside leg and the end result is a scampered leg bye
text: there's a speculative appeal from Bollinger as Steyn is struck on the pad, but this landed well outside leg and the end result is a scampered leg bye

commentary: Bollinger to Botha, FOUR runs Botha is starting to middle a few now! But is it too little too late? The ball was short once again, and Botha's pull beat the man at short fine leg
text: Botha is starting to middle a few now! But is it too little too late? The ball was short once again, and Botha's pull beat the man at short fine leg

commentary: Bollinger to Botha, no run Botha walks right across his stumps and shovels a drive hard at mid on
text: Botha walks right across his stumps and shovels a drive hard at mid on

commentary: Bollinger to Botha, FOUR runs straight down the ground! Four more for Botha. This was a quality cricket shot. He picked up the length delivery and lifted it straight back over Bollinger's head
text: straight down the ground! Four more for Botha. This was a quality cricket shot. He picked up the length delivery and lifted it straight back over Bollinger's head

commentary: Bollinger to Botha, SIX runs Botha on the attack! More length from Bollinger and it's disappeared over wide long on for six. Do South Africa still have a chance? Rusty and Waleed will say they do!
text: Botha on the attack! More length from Bollinger and it's disappeared over wide long on for six. Do South Africa still have a chance? Rusty and Waleed will say they do!

commentary: Johnson to Steyn, no run Steyn doesn't come close to laying bat on ball with a flatfooted swish outside off
text: Steyn doesn't come close to laying bat on ball with a flatfooted swish outside off

commentary: Johnson to Steyn, no run Johnson pushes this one slightly wider on the angle across the left-hander, who misses with the cut this time
text: Johnson pushes this one slightly wider on the angle across the left-hander, who misses with the cut this time

commentary: Johnson to Steyn, FOUR runs Steyn will keep swinging! He has another go and this time finds the middle, flat-batting a length delivery over mid on after clearing the left leg
text: Steyn will keep swinging! He has another go and this time finds the middle, flat-batting a length delivery over mid on after clearing the left leg

commentary: Johnson to Steyn, OUT Steyn perishes in search of runs! Johnson pulled his length back and Steyn slashed hard into an uppercut, but could only spoon the ball down to Bollinger at third man. Good catch by the lanky fast bowler, and South Africa lose another one

commentary: Cummins to Botha, OUT he's trodden on his stumps! Cummins has his third. Early in his career to get a hit wicket. Botha went back and across then pulled a short ball away, but the in process of playing the stroke his back foot when into the base of stumps
